name: PINHI!
description: Endure your senses into a synth based hyper-casual, level-based, mini-golf style oasis! Hit all the walls before putting the ball! Levels will increase in difficulty the higher the level. There are 5 levels per tier. The player gets 6 strokes per level, where failing all 6 strokes will reset back to level 1 of the current tier! Up to the challenge? Good luck!
